title: Interpretation of a tiger in a dream

preview.html: The death of a tiger in a dream indicates the dreamer’s kindness and livelihood, and the tiger biting the dreamer indicates poverty and humiliation for him, and the tiger approaching the dreamer indicates trouble. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a tiger attacking an unmarried girl in a dream, and looking at it with great fear. It indicates dangers. There are many things that she will see in her life during this period of her life, and God knows best. The unmarried woman saw a tiger near her, and she was afraid of it, but it did not harm her. It indicates that she will go through some new transactions in her life and will be very successful in them. What if the unmarried woman saw an unmarried tiger? For a married woman, the tiger was alive in a dream and was playing next to her in the dream. The meaning is interpreted as that he will excel and succeed in all the new things he starts. The vision shows that an unmarried woman is looking at a tiger in a dream, and she is inside a small cage. A sign that she She missed many things in her life, and she is always thinking recklessly about her life. A large tiger in a dream indicates difficult things that a single woman fears in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that the tiger was Sitting near her in a dream and feeling sorry. It explains that she will face some big problems in her life during this time, and God knows best. It also indicates that the married woman will end the inevitable problems in her life. And if she looks at the tiger inside her house in a dream, and feels great fear in the dream. It appears. She is able to live her life stably and calmly and strives to achieve that. The dream shows the good things that this married woman would like to do in her life. Likewise, seeing a married woman playing with a tiger in a dream indicates a happy life for her. If the tiger was killed in the dream and was afraid Very sad from the dream and angry to see it. It shows that she is feeling frustrated in many of the things she is doing in her life at this time. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman dreams that a tiger was sitting near her in the dream, she is afraid. It shows that she will live now. In some not good things in her life. What if a divorced woman looks at a dead tiger in a dream and does not care about it in the dream. Here, it shows that she is sad about some things that she is seriously going through at this time in her life. He also saw a free tiger in a divorced woman’s dream And he walked behind her and in front of her in the dream. Here she shows her fear of life and society, and that she is very preoccupied with their affairs due to daydreaming. It also explains that the divorced woman who sees the tiger was very close to her in the dream. The meaning indicates that she will experience some bad things at this time in her life. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer saw in a dream that the tiger was near him in the dream and he was afraid of it. It shows that he will live in great distress at this time in his life, and God the Most High is All-Knowing. As Appears in a dream, there are great sorrows

title: Interpretation of golden shoes in a dream: Seeing shoes in a dream

preview.html: The dream of golden shoes for a single woman, married woman, pregnant woman, or divorced woman, whether she is wearing new boots, torn shoes, clean, dirty, long shoes, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of golden shoes in a dream: Golden shoes in a dream carry many meanings, including preparation for starting a new stage in life. This stage could be marriage, entering into a new romantic relationship, or even starting a new job. If the shoes are golden and comfortable and you find yourself walking in them comfortably, this is evidence that you will enjoy psychological comfort and will be happy in your life because comfort and success will be written for you. In other dreams, the golden shoe may appear torn, and this is evidence that the next stage will be a failure, so be careful in the choices you make in your life, such as marriage, accepting a new job, or any offer that comes your way. The shoe in general is evidence of protection because it protects the feet from Damage while walking. In many cases, shoes can indicate the marriage of an unmarried woman in a dream. The husband according to the specifications that the shoe carries in the dream, that is, if it is luxurious, then the husband is sophisticated. The shape of the shoes and their cleanliness in the dream affects the life that you live. If the shoes are torn and dirty, this means that you You are not yet able to make an appropriate decision in your life that may be related to your future or your work. Shoes in a dream may indicate marriage, and the characteristics of the expected pair are determined by the specifications and type of the shoe and the dreamer’s feeling about it. Just as the shoe indicates the earth or a specific place, so whoever wears new shoes will leave To new land or placeIt is removed from the land or place in which it is located. Taking off your shoes can also indicate weakness and anxiety. Shoes indicate prevention and protection because they protect the feet and protect them from harm. Shoes are also believed to indicate the meaning of the things they are used in. Formal shoes indicate an important job and sports shoes for travel and fun. Long shoes (shoes) can indicate a home or home. Or a tall building. A shoe is a cover for the beholder because it covers the foot. Shoes in general in a dream appear to a woman as her husband, as well as a man to his wife... And in the interpretation, it is a symbol of striving, perseverance, and travel... Imam Al-Sadiq said in interpreting the dream of a shoe or shoe: It is in a man’s dream of his wife, and whoever sees in His dream that he bought new shoes and did not walk in them, then you will. Marriage in that year...interpretation of the golden shoe in one dream. The golden shoe in a dream is a complex symbol, half of its interpretation depends on the symbol of the shoe and the other half depends on the interpretation of the golden color in the dream. In the interpretation of dreams, shoes are classified under descriptive symbols, that is, symbols whose interpretation varies From person to person and from one situation to another, unlike abstract symbols whose meaning is often the same. The golden color in a dream is the color that makes the dream a good sign as a whole. It is the color of success and progress, and it is the color of ambition... In some dreams, the golden color in shoes indicates wealth, money and bliss... If she sees in her dream that she is not married, as if she is

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a single woman

preview.html: If the unmarried woman succeeds in her dream and the lice disappear, this indicates that she will get rid of all the worries and problems that she is going through in her life, God willing. Interpretation of seeing lice in the hair in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried woman dreams that she sees a lot of large lice in her hair and it appears Very bad. This is an indication that there are some problems that she is facing in her life during this period of time. I saw in the dream the unmarried woman who dreamed that she removed lice from her hair and was happy. This is an indication that he will get rid of all the problems and fears that he is experiencing. And the unmarried woman The one who saw in a dream that lice were abundant in her hair and walking on her body in the dream. It indicates a great loss that this single girl will suffer in life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And to see an unmarried woman in a dream is to see a lot of very large lice in the hair in the dream. And here it is. An indication that she is delaying her engagement during this period of her life, and she must get closer to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing a married woman. Interpretation of seeing lice in the hair in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman who dreams of having a lot of lice in her hair and was very sad about their presence It shows that there are problems that she will see with her husband at this time in her life. Thus, a married woman who dreams that there is a large lice walking on her body and in her hair in the dream. It shows that there are unsuitable people who will enter her life. It also shows that the married woman is looking for something In a dream to rid her of lice in her hair. It explains that she will suffer a lot during this period of her life, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. And a married woman saw that her children’s hair had many lice in it. It indicates the disease to which they will be exposed at this time. Interpretation of seeing lice in the hair in a dream for a divorced woman if The divorced woman who dreamed saw in a dream that there was a lot of lice in her hair and she was afraid of it. It explains that she will suffer a lot in this period of her life, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. And a divorced woman is searching in a dream for something that will rid her of lice in the dream. This is an indication that there are problems. You face it, but you will get rid of it soon, God willing. It also suggests that the divorced woman in the dream is looking for the moon in her hair. This is an indication that she is looking for things that bother her and make her sad in life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The divorced dreamer who sees in a dream that lice were many and were walking On the ground in a dream. He explained that this divorced woman will face a lot of trouble during this period because of her ex-husband. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about lice in hairInterpretation of seeing lice in hair in a dream about a man and its meaningEither the dreamer sees in a dream that there are a lot of lice in his hair and back Very annoying. This indicates that he will fall into some problems related to his field of work, and God is the Most High. The dreamer saw that he was looking at a hair in a dream and it was very infested with lice and he was very sorry. Here it explains the great loss that he will suffer and experience during this time. And the dreamer who sees

title: What is the interpretation of falling front teeth in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?  Interpretation of a dream about the lower front teeth falling out and one of the front teeth falling out in a dream

preview.html: Front teeth falling out in a dream. Front teeth are considered complementary to a person’s general appearance, due to their ability to display a smile in the best way and condition. For many reasons, a person sees the fall of front teeth in a dream as a bad omen and brings it. Pessimism for its owner due to his fear of this happening in real life, and we will present number one of the scholars’ interpretations regarding the interpretation of a dream about front teeth falling out. Front teeth falling out in Ibn Sirin’s dream Front teeth falling out in a dream The interpretation of a dream about a person’s front teeth falling out represents fears and problems that a person faces when he is unable or unable to able to deal with it. If the front teeth fall out, if they are followed by pain in the dream, it is interpreted in principle as comfort and a solution to problems or good news about the passage of crises for the one who sees the least losses. There are some sayings about the interpretation of a dream about the front teeth falling out, if they are healthy and do not cause any harm or Pain for the dreamer, the interpretation of the dream expresses the loss of a close person without a previous illness of that person who makes it. About accepting his death. Interpretation of a dream about front teeth falling out as one of the signs of fear of appearing in front of people, even if the dreamer is committing sins and transgressions in secret, it could be a sign of hypocrisy in this case. Front teeth falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin The interpretation of the dream depends on that the front teeth According to the scholar Ibn Sirin, it depends on the state in which the dreamer appears in a dream, as the state of fear and anxiety in which a person can see himself in a dream is a result of this. Falling out of his front teeth may be an indication of his fear of disappearing beauty or growing old. Also, falling out front teeth in a dream could be a sign of losing the prestige of insight in the family or a decline in status associated with his work. In case the dreamer is going through a period of turmoil at work Negatively affect his psychological state, the interpretation of the dream for him in this case may reflect his inner feeling of fear of losing the source of survival. Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Fall Front teeth in a dream for a single woman: The fall of the front teeth in an unmarried girl’s dream is a strong indication that there will be difficult times that the girl will go through in the days following this dream. An unmarried girl’s dream of her front teeth falling out in a dream may be a result of the stress and fear that the dreamer is suffering from. As a result of delayed engagement or marriage and the lack of a successful romantic relationship in light of her advanced age. Tooth. Likewise, the interpretation of a dream about an unmarried woman’s front teeth falling out is a sign of the loss of her father or guardian, and in this dream there are indications that the girl’s support is lost in her. . Life due to a serious illness or the closest term in other cases. Interpretation of a dream about the front teeth falling out in single women. title: Interpretation of seeing fear of ostriches in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the fear of an ostrich through the website Vision roy2a.com. The ostrich is a type of large, flightless bird that is distinguished by its large wings, long neck, and distinctive appearance. Seeing the fear of ostrich in a dream. What is the meaning of presenting this dream? The most important interpretations that came from great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing fear of ostrich in a dream. Seeing yourself running away from an ostrich in a dream. Dealing with fear of the future and the inability to control things and make decisions. Seeing an ostrich running away in a dream indicates abandonment of responsibilities, frequent escaping from events, and weak insightful personality as a warning. To him. The dream of running after an ostrich indicates that a man has many whims with women and follows his desires. Seeing you running after an ostrich is on the wrong paths in life. Seeing an ostrich running away in a dream indicates an increase in burdens and burdens on the dreamer due to his misbehavior and management of his affairs. See also: Interpretation of seeing fear in a dream. Interpretation Seeing the terror of an ostrich in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin tells us about seeing the fear of ostriches in a dream is an indication of the poor psychological state of the priest due to his fear and excessive anxiety. Seeing an ostrich in a dream and my opinion was afraid of it is an indication of financial difficulties or losing money. A dream about being afraid of ostriches indicates that he should think a lot about the future and achieve Goals, which adds a state of panic to the viewer. Seeing an ostrich chasing a dreamer in a dream without fear, shows that he was able to take charge of his life and make quick decisions. Seeing an ostrich in a dream indicates problems and difficulties that the visionary will soon face in his life. Seeing an ostrich attacking and biting the fortuneteller is a sign of trials and losses. The big one. See also: Interpretation of seeing eavesdropping in a dream. Interpretation of fear of ostriches in a dream for a single woman. Seeing fear of ostriches in a girl’s dream means that she is afraid of ostriches, fearing that she will come to make a decision in her life related to marriage or work. Seeing an ostrich fleeing in a dream for a girl indicates her escaping from the responsibilities she faces. Behind it, whether scientific or practical. Seeing fear of ostriches indicates the presence of a girl in a bad psychological state due to tension, fear, and overthinking. Seeing an ostrich in a girl’s dream without fear is an indication of her self-esteem and good qualities, and perhaps the approaching date of her engagement. If a girl sees herself in a dream eating Ostrich meat, a sign of good news on the way to her. See also: Interpretation of seeing an ostrich in a dream. Interpretation of seeing fear of ostrich in a dream for a married woman. Seeing ostrich in a married woman’s dream is a good vision, which portends the emergence of goodness and livelihood for her and tranquility in her home. If a married woman sees an ostrich eating a snake Within her dream is evidence of her getting rid of the envy and haters around her. Seeing the fear of an ostrich and running away from it in a married woman’s dream is a sign that you are not seizing opportunities at the right time. See also: Interpretation of seeing an eagle in a dream. We are happy to show you the place where your dreams will be received. Interpretation of the dream of fear of the ostrich through interpretation

Seeing ostrich in a married woman’s dream is a good vision, which portends the emergence of goodness and livelihood for her and tranquility in her home. If a married woman sees an ostrich eating a snake Within her dream is evidence of her getting rid of the envy and haters around her. Seeing the fear of an ostrich and running away from it in a married woman’s dream is a sign that you are not seizing opportunities at the right time. See also: Interpretation of seeing an eagle in a dream. We are happy to show you the place where your dreams will be received. Interpretation of the dream of fear of the ostrich through interpretation

title: Interpretation of a dark road in a dream of a dark road

preview.html: A dream about a dark road for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man, whether he is walking or walking on a dark road, walking at night with someone I know, a dark road, seeing the dark place, coming out of the darkness, illuminating a dark place according to Ibn Sirin and more ways Darkness in a dream is one of the dreams that many people experience in their dreams, because they think a lot about life issues and the problems that the dreamer faces in his general life, as dark roads are dense in our lives and we can dream about them and this causes a state of anxiety and fear of the road, and brings us Many different signs that the dreamer must pay attention to. Interpretation of the dark road in a dream. Ibn Shaheen explained that whoever sees that he is walking on a dark road and the road confuses him, and sees that he is on the straight path, then hopes to be guided. Seeing yourself walking on a dark street at night It refers to the darkness of the horizon, heart, or mind as a result of concern for matters outside religion or morals. As for walking on a paved road equipped with lights or lamps, it indicates guidance and a rational or correct path, but if the road is illuminated by the light of the moon or stars, this is a sign of goodness, prosperity and prosperity. Interpretation of a dark road in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing an unmarried woman walking in a dark street in a dream It indicates that she will suffer from many problems that will make her suffer from many psychological and neurological diseases, because if she does not get out of the circle of this disorder, she will suffer greatly. Affected by loneliness and a lot of depression. The dark road in the dream is evidence that the dreamer will suffer from great sadness and this will make him turn away from the taste of a beautiful life. Seeing the dreamer walking on a dark road in a dream, remembering God and asking for forgiveness in the dream, is evidence that the dreamer will suffer from problems. , but he will get rid of it with the support of his prayers and forgiveness. In life, and God will give him life and help him get out of distress. A person walking on a completely dark path is evidence that he is a sinful person who is far from Almighty God and does not like God’s guidance and closeness. Seeing a dark road and the dreamer was walking on it in the dream but he found a ray of light on the road is evidence However, the dreamer is an ordinary person, far from crooked, and that he is on the right path. Seeing a pregnant woman in her last month walking on a dark street in a dream means that she will give birth soon and give birth correctly. Seeing a young man walking on a dark path and extreme sadness is evidence that he will receive a great betrayal from His friends and he chooses to stay away from them, to find solace and stay away from problems. Interpretation of driving a car on a dark road in a dreamDriving a car on a dark road in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer did not feel the joy of this world at all. It also indicates that the dreamer is losing everything beautiful in his general life and also indicates that he will suffer from severe stress in life. Driving a carriage in a dream on a dark road and the road was very dark, evidence that The dreamer follows his desires and seeks to satisfy them. Vision from a dark place - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about a horse by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a horse: Among the dreams that carry many connotations and interpretations, some symbolize good and others symbolize evil, and to arrive at the correct interpretations we wanted to rely on the books of the great dream interpreters, and today through the site we will deal with the interpretation of dreams. The dream is for both men and women, depending on the different social status. Interpretation of a dream about a horse: Seeing horses in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that symbolizes that the doors of kindness and living will open for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a horse in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will be able to achieve all his goals. Among the interpretations, it is indicated that there are a number of situations that will happen to the dreamer that will make him happy in his life for a long time. Whoever has suffered distress and anxiety in his life, seeing horses in a dream is good evidence that his circumstances will change for the better, and God Almighty will grant him stability and peace. Watching A beautiful horse in a dream means that the dreamer will receive a lot of money which will ensure the stability of his financial situation for a long time. Financial gains. Slaughtering a horse in a dream is an unpleasant vision that symbolizes that the dreamer will experience a bad period in his life and will find himself in successive problems. Cleaning horses in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is a patient and wise person who can endure all the crises that he experiences from time to time. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is kissing horses, this indicates the end of a series of relationships in the dreamer’s life in the coming period. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream in a dream: A horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin is one of those dreams that carry various interpretations, including positive and negative. The following are the most important of these interpretations: Seeing horses in a dream usually symbolizes that the dreamer will commit many bad deeds and sins that have kept him away from the path of Almighty God. Seeing horses in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is going through a series of situations that will negatively affect his life. Seeing a horse Beautiful in a dream is evidence that the dreamer’s life will be very stable and that he will be able to achieve his various goals. Seeing a sick horse in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is going through a series of crises that will cause him great sadness. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing equestrian clothing to ride a horse, then this A sign that the person who has the vision is a leader and will be able to defeat his enemies and reach his goals in the end. Riding a horse in a dream is a sign that in the coming period the dreamer will get a job opportunity in a prestigious place with a salary that will help him improve his financial level. Interpretation of a dream about one horse, unmarried girl Whoever sees a horse in her dream is a clear sign that her marriage to a man who holds an important position in the country in which she lives is approaching, and as he pushed her away, she will be able to find happiness with him. A number of other interpretations of the vision: Seeing a horse in an unmarried woman’s dream is clear evidence that she will be exposed to many problems, but over time she will be able to face them and her life will become remarkably stable. The multiple horses in an unmarried girl’s dream means

title: Interpretation of loose teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Loose teeth in a dream is one of the dreams that carries in the souls of those who see it many feelings of fear and anxiety, especially since teeth are an integral part of the human body. Therefore, its interpretation had to be presented in order to find out the gestures it carries with senior scholars, taking into account the dreamer’s face and psychological state. Looseness Teeth in a dream: Losing teeth in a dream indicates the constant disputes that he experiences with his wife due to the lack of understanding or equality between them, and it may reach the point of separation between them. The meaning also indicates that he accepts failure in the scope of his work or depression in his profession, but he must persevere in succeeding with God’s help. Her trembling in a dream is evidence of his distraction, imbalance, and inability to achieve his dreams and aspirations. It conveys to the widow an indication of her sorrows, feelings of inferiority, and longing for her controlling husband. For a divorced woman, this is an indication of what she is looking for in terms of security and peace of mind after this sad experience that She passed by it and drank its bitterness. Loose teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the dream is evidence of the dreamer’s reluctance to make any right decision in his life. Losing teeth is an indication of the financial problems and obstacles that he experiences in his life. The interpretation symbolizes what degrades his status among people. His dignity and his need to arrange his papers and stand up for himself a little. His inability to chew is a sign of a serious illness. Interpretation from another angle according to Ibn Sirin is evidence of the narrow situation and confusion that this person suffers from. Loose teeth in a dream for an unmarried woman. Stubborn teeth in a dream indicate for an unmarried woman. A married woman indicates that she is going through a financial and psychological crisis, but she must overcome it with her determination and good faith in God. The interpretation elsewhere leads to tension and confusion over an issue and her inability to take a decisive stance. It also indicates that there is someone in her life that she loves even though he does not bring She has the peace of mind and security that she desires. Teeth falling out on her clothes is evidence that she will get married soon. The appearance of new teeth after their appearance symbolizes that they have achieved everything they aspire to or dream of. Interpretation of a dream about losing lower teeth for a single woman: A dream about losing lower teeth for an unmarried woman It expresses the illness that she or one of the women close to her is suffering from and she needs prayer because only God is in control of things. He shakes her without her falling out, and it shows that her mother is going through a health crisis, but it is quickly overcome by God’s grace and mercy. Watching teeth being loosened It falls to the ground, indicating the end of the death of the unmarried mother due to a fatal disease that befalls her or the misfortune that befalls this girl. And God knows best. The girl who plays with the lower teeth and feels pain is an indication of the worries and problems that dominate her thinking space. The meaning in the last place is a sign of the events that are disturbing her, but they will end soon. Interpretation of a dream about loose upper teeth for a single woman in the dream is an indication of what is going on between her and her. Close to her, but she has to

title: Interpretation of eating corn in a dream is good and evil in all circumstances

preview.html: Today we learn about the interpretation of eating corn in a dream, as corn is considered one of the delicious foods that many young and old love because it contains a beautiful taste in addition to its high nutritional value, in addition to being included in many different meals and recipes and giving a distinctive taste to the meals it enters into. In this, but what does seeing corn in a dream carry, is it a promising dream or a warning dream? This is what we will discover in the following article on the Encyclopedia website, so stay tuned. Interpretation of eating corn in a dream for a man A man who sees in a dream that he is buying corn and then eating it, this dream is one of the most promising dreams because it indicates that this man enjoys stability in his marital life and that he and his wife are making enough effort to create a healthy family and raise their children in a healthy way, and this is good news that his children will help him in life's problems. Eating a lot of corn in a man's dream is considered one of the good dreams that indicate the dreamer's promotion in his job or that he will find a good job that he dreamed of, God willing. The merchant who sees in his dream that he is eating corn, and its taste is delicious, this dream promises him that his trade will benefit, God willing, and he will get a lot of money from this trade. The young man who dreams that he sees corn repeatedly in a dream, this dream indicates that he will get a lot of money in his life and that he will be able to achieve the dreams he aspires to, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating corn and it was in the corn season, this dream means that the dreamer will become famous among people and that he will be able to achieve everything he wants in life. Of the bad dreams If one sees corn in his sleep, and the corn is withered and dry, this dream means that he will be exposed to the loss of one of his parents and his death will be the beginning that will make him feel sad. Pain in his life. The meaning of eating corn in an unmarried girl's dream The interpretation of seeing eating corn in an unmarried girl's dream differs according to the details she saw in the dream, as follows: An unmarried girl in a bad psychological state, and she feels that there is no way to get rid of these pains and sorrows, then she dreams that she is eating corn, this dream is one of the good dreams that shows that comfort will come to her soon, God willing, and that she will feel joy and happiness and the things that caused her this pain will end. One of the good visions for an unmarried girl is to see in her dream that she is distributing yellow corn to many people in life whom she knows or does not know. If the girl sees that the corn in her dream fell to the ground, this dream means that the problems and sorrows that this girl suffers from will end soon, God willing. To see a lot of corn in a dream for an unmarried girl means that someone will propose to that girl and that this person is characterized by good morals and good treatment and that the girl will feel comfortable with him, agree to be associated with him and her life with him will be happy, God willing. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that the corn is green, this

title: Interpretation of a dream about the color purple Seeing the color purple in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the color violet or violet for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether it is a purple dress, car shoes, shirt, dress, purchase, wear, or dress, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of a dream about color Purple by Ibn Sirini The purple color refers to emotion such as love and happiness, and on the other hand it can mean money, wealth and social power. The dark purple color indicates psychological ambiguity and this indicates that the dreamer is trying to discover himself. It is the last color in the list of light so some associate it with death and it is the color of the end of the cycle. Among the most prominent meanings of seeing the color violet in a dream, we point out that it indicates wealth, wealth, and riches that the dreamer seeks to achieve in real life. Seeing this color in a dream is evidence that this matter will happen in the near future. Among the most important symbols is that seeing the color violet in a dream. It holds the high positions that the dreamer aspires to. Seeing this color could be a sign of some promotion at work or his success in one of the social tasks. The purple color is one of the most beautiful royal colors. Whoever sees it in his dream, this is a sign of the great success that he will achieve in the long term and the great fame that he will gain after a period of fatigue. And effort in the goal of reaching success. Whoever dreams of wearing the color purple in his sleep, this is a sign that he will have loyal friends close to him in various areas of life. The dreamer can get help from some friends to achieve his goals and they will be his close friends. Seeing the color purple in a dream indicates joy The big one who will dominate the dreamer’s life, especially if he sees that everything around him has turned to this color and that everyone who saw him and met him in a dream was wearing this color. Violet comes forward, picks it up and kisses it. Violets and similar winds are evidence of the presence of an unstable woman, a short-lived boy, or many diseases. And whoever sees violets in his dream with some roses, it shows familiarity and love. The violet plant is the one that he sees growing in its time, so it benefits a woman or a slave girl, or she gives birth to a child, and if he sees it swollen, it indicates sadness. It was said: If a woman sees that he picks violets from its veins and gives it to him To her husband, this indicates his divorce. Whoever sees violets and gives them to his servant indicates that he will keep them, and if one dreams that he is given a bouquet of violets, this indicates separation. Seeing the color purple in a dream indicates the greatness that the dreamer will enjoy in reality, in addition to wealth and prosperity. Which he will enjoy. The color purple in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes that most of his dreams and desires will soon be fulfilled. Seeing the color purple in a dream indicates important positions that the dreamer will obtain and the professional success that he will achieve in reality. When the dreamer sees a certain person in a dream wearing purple clothes, this is a sign On kindness and sustenance. The general meaning of the color violet in a dream: This color was given by nature only once, and this color is due to the violet flower,
